AssignedPermissions.name: Catalog Tenant-level Entitlement Management
AssignedPermissions.description: Entitle services, catalog items and actions to all users within a tenant.

AssignedPermissions.name: Manage Tenant Files
AssignedPermissions.description: Upload and delete files belonging to this tenant.

AssignedPermissions.name: Tenant Administrator Role Assignment
AssignedPermissions.description: Assign the tenant administrator role to other users.

AssignedPermissions.name: Catalog Tenant-level Author
AssignedPermissions.description: Create, update and publish services, catalog items and actions shared across a Tenant.

AssignedPermissions.name: My Tenant Directories, Groups and Users Administration User Interfaces
AssignedPermissions.description: Access my tenant directories, groups and users administration GUIs.

AssignedPermissions.name: Manage user data (requests, items, tasks etc) within a tenant.
AssignedPermissions.description: Manage user created objects belonging to the tenant.

AssignedPermissions.name: View tenant event log
AssignedPermissions.description: View event log messages for the tenant

AssignedPermissions.name: Catalog Consume Tenant Management
AssignedPermissions.description: Consume services, resources and manage requests on behalf of any user within a Tenant

AssignedPermissions.name: Manage Tenant Context Property Groups
AssignedPermissions.description: Create, update and delete context property groups within a tenant

AssignedPermissions.name: Manage Tenant Context Property Definitions
AssignedPermissions.description: Create, update and delete context property definitions within a tenant
